title: Green buds of hope
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Children and war
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Infants - Mortality
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Child welfare
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child welfare
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Poland - Social conditions
description: Child welfare facilities in post war Poland; effect of such services on child mortality figures; new baby clinics established in city areas; mobile clinic units, creches, and activities in the country's 7000 nursery schools, where children receive free medical and dental attention; during vacations, holidays are organized and children from Warsaw and Krakow visit the mountains or the seaside.
